TEXT.TITLE: SILICON GRAPHICS <SGIC> SELLS CONVERTIBLE DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Silicon Graphics Inc is raising 35 mln dlrs via an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 with a 5-3/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Morgan Stanley and Co Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 30.35 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 25.15 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the issue is rated B-2 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and CCC-plus by Standard and Poor's Corp. Alex Brown and Sons Inc co-managed the deal. Reuter
